creator: theocleminson@hotmail.com
text:
Add a compareSize option to copy task to trigger a copy when file size differs
(regardless of date).

Currently adding jars to a project doesn't necessarily trigger a copy update
(unless overwrite is specified). This occurs when the date the first jar was
last copied.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
the <different> selector automatically assumes that files of different size are
different.
